      • register

        public User register(java.lang.String login,
                     java.lang.String password,
                     java.lang.String roleString)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        This method allows you to register an user in the database.
        Specified by:
        register in interface UsersManagementService
        Parameters:
        login - the login for this user
        password - the password for this user
        roleString - the role for this user. (The role must be `admin` or `customer`)
        Returns:
        the new User with the auto increment id register in the object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throw an exception if the user login already exist

      • unregister

        public boolean unregister(int id,
                          java.lang.String token)
        This method allows you to unregister an user in the database.
        Specified by:
        unregister in interface UsersManagementService
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the user to unregister
        token - the token of an admin user
        Returns:
        true if the unregister is realized

        This method allows you to get all users in the database.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the token
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throw an exception if the login or/and password is invalid

      • disconnect

        public boolean disconnect(java.lang.String token)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This method allows you to disconnect an user.
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface UsersManagementService
        Parameters:
        token - the token of the user to disconnect
        Returns:
        true if the disconnection is realized, else false
        Throws:
